name: ECS
description: Elastic Container Service — managed container orchestration.
backend: Checks cluster health, task status, and deployment events.

name: EKS
description: Elastic Kubernetes Service — managed Kubernetes clusters.
backend: Simulates node readiness, API server latency, and pod scheduling delays.

name: CloudFront
description: Content Delivery Network — global edge caching service.
backend: Monitors cache hit ratio, edge latency, and error response rates.

name: Elastic Load Balancing
description: Distributes traffic across targets to improve availability.
backend: Simulates target group health checks and connection latency.

name: VPC
description: Virtual Private Cloud — isolated network environments.
backend: Tests subnet routing, NAT gateway reachability, and network ACL rules.
